text:
July 28, 1959
Mr, Monroe Bush
Assistant to the President
Old Dominion Foundation
716 Jackson Place, H.W,
Washington, D, C#
Dear Monroes
I am taking the liberty of sending you a copy of our forthcoming
UAEB Network offering* I thought you might be interested in what
the nation*s educational radio network is doing, I also thought
you might have particular interest in the programs listed on
pages 9, 10, 13, Hi, 19, 20, 23, 39, la, 1,15, 52, and S3.
Sincerely,
HJStJO
Barry J, Skornia
Executive Director
